title: The Right Stuff (1983) The first astronauts (Opt.MULTISUBS)
description:
The Right Stuff (1983) The first astronauts (Opt.MULTISUBS) <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0086197/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0086197/</a>

Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files (Work in Windows Media Player etc. - see enclosed Note):
Danish, Dutch (srt format), English, English for the hearing impaired, Finnish, German, Icelandic, Norwegian, Swedish.

Amazing story of the first astronauts who started out as test pilots in primitive rocket planes trying to break the sound barrier, up to the first manned space missions with lots of interesting historic details.

My ripping procedure has succeeded in rendering decent quality for 700 Mb rips of films up to 2.5 hours, but it gave up on this 3 hour elefant. So I had to increase the filesize to 800 Mb. Check comments on my torrent,
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4235467/

Widescreen DVDrip XviD 2-pass 704x384, great stereo sound AC3.
Runs well in both my standalone DivX players.

The enclosed sample shows Chuck Yeager being the first to break the sound barrier.
